Package org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor

Interface Summary
FileWorthStorageElement An interface which the economic models must implement as well as the generic StorageElement interface.
Optimisable This interface must be implemented by all replica optimiser classes.
 

Class Summary
AccessHistoryStorageElement An extension of SimpleStorageElement which keeps a record of file accesses.
EcoBinModelOptimiser This optimiser makes decisions on replication based on the binomial economic model.
EconomicBinomialStorageElement A StorageElement which implements an economic model for file replication.
EconomicModelOptimiser This abstract class provides the getBestFile used by all economic model optimisers.
EconomicZipfStorageElement This StorageElement implements a Zipf-based economic model for file replication.
EcoZipfModelOptimiser This optimiser makes decisions on replication based on the economic model, using the Zipf-based prediction function.
LfuOptimiser This optimiser replicates files at all times unless it is not possible due to all files on the local SE being pinned or masters.
LfuStorageElement A StorageElement where the file to delete is chosen using a Least Frequently Used (LFU) algorithm.
LruOptimiser This optimiser replicates files at all times unless it is not possible due to all files on the local SE being pinned or masters.
LruStorageElement This StorageElement deletes the file stored on it that was accessed least recently.
OptimiserFactory This factory is used by Computing Elements to obtain an instance of the required optimiser.
ReplicatingOptimiser This optimiser provides an implementation of getBestFile() which will attempt to perform replication of files to the close Storage Element of the Computing Element calling it (if the file is not already available there).
SimpleOptimiser This optimiser finds the 'best' replica of the required file but never replicates, all files are read by remote I/O.
SimpleStorageElement The simplest implementation of StorageElement, providing all the basic file handling methods and a simple implementation of fileToDelete().
SkelOptor This class is the basic implementation of the Optimisable interface.
StorageElementFactory Factory method for generating the correct type of StorageElement for the given optimiser.
